title: President Rajapaksa pays respect to Late Venezuelan President Hugo Chavez
content: – By Janaka Alahapperuma – Pix By: Nalin Hewapathirana – President Mahinda Rajapaksa paid his respect to the late Venezuelan President Hugo Chavez this morning on 09 March by signing the book of condolence which is placed for the general public at the Embassy of Cuba at Anderson Road in Colombo….
